reviews.text: I am surprised. I was skeptical at first, but after a friend's recommendation, I visited the restaurant. The pizzas have a unique taste, grilled. I was speechless
I am extremely pleased. Delicious food and pleasant atmosphere. There are plenty of waiters good at what they do, polite and smiling. The chefs are top notch
Forget the walk-in pizzerias. This hidden new place is amazing. Wish they did home delivery. I came, I saw, I tried, I appreciated
Cozy place. I just found out who the chefs were and immediately visited. It looks like that only use quality products. The staff are exceptional professionals and they understand the work
